abstract: The current playback time, in seconds, of the current entry.
overview:
## Discussion

Changing the value of this property moves the playhead to the new location. For content streaming live from a server, this value represents the time from the beginning of the playlist when it first loads. This property returns `NaN` if the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime] is invalid or indefinite.

# playbackTime

**Instance Property**

The current playback time, in seconds, of the current entry.

## Declaration

```swift
var playbackTime: TimeInterval { get set }
```

## Discussion

Changing the value of this property moves the playhead to the new location. For content streaming live from a server, this value represents the time from the beginning of the playlist when it first loads. This property returns `NaN` if the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime] is invalid or indefinite.
title: playbackTime
